com.scalar.database.api

Class Scan

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scalar.database.api.Operation
      • com.scalar.database.api.Selection
        • com.scalar.database.api.Scan

  • @NotThreadSafe
public class Scan
extends Selection
    A command to retrieve entries within a partition from DistributedStorage. The scan range is defined with a starting clustering key and an ending clustering key. Scan.Ordering can also be specified to return Results in ascending order or descending order of clustering keys. The number of Result can also be limited. If none of these are set, it will return all the Results with a specified partition key in some order.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Scan.Ordering
      An optional parameter of Scan command to specify ordering of returned results.

        public Scan withOrdering(Scan.Ordering ordering)

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this object. The other object is considered equal if:
        • both super class instances are equal and
        • it is also an Scan and
        • both instances have the same clustering key range, orderings and limit
        Overrides:
        equals in class Selection
        Parameters:
